<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This can be used with \\c PreservedAnalyses to mark the CFG as preserved and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to query whether it has been preserved.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The CFG of a function is defined as the set of basic blocks and the edges</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// between them. Changing the set of basic blocks in a function is enough to</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A set of analyses that are preserved following a run of a transformation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// pass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Transformation passes build and return these objects to communicate which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// analyses are still valid after the transformation. For most passes this is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// fairly simple: if they don&#39;t change anything all analyses are preserved,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// otherwise only a short list of analyses that have been explicitly updated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// are preserved.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This class also lets transformation passes mark abstract &#42;sets&#42; of analyses</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// as preserved. A transformation that (say) does not alter the CFG can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// indicate such by marking a particular AnalysisSetKey as preserved, and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// then analyses can query whether that AnalysisSetKey is preserved.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Finally, this class can represent an &quot;abandoned&quot; analysis, which is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// not preserved even if it would be covered by some abstract set of analyses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Given a &#96;PreservedAnalyses&#96; object, an analysis will typically want to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// figure out whether it is preserved. In the example below, MyAnalysisType is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// preserved if it&#39;s not abandoned, and (a) it&#39;s explicitly marked as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// preserved, (b), the set AllAnalysesOn&lt;MyIRUnit&gt; is preserved, or (c) both</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// AnalysisSetA and AnalysisSetB are preserved.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#96;&#96;&#96;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   if (PAC.preserved() || PAC.preservedSet&lt;AllAnalysesOn&lt;MyIRUnit&gt;&gt;() ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     // The analysis has been successfully preserved ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A checker object that makes it easy to query for whether an analysis or</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/preservedanalysischecker"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">PreservedAnalysisChecker &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/preservedanalysischecker/#a95bf63b09676aa0018e54d1592c7d912"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">friend</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/preservedanalysischecker/#a95bf63b09676aa0018e54d1592c7d912">PreservedAnalyses</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/preservedanalysischecker/#a95bf63b09676aa0018e54d1592c7d912">PreservedAnalyses</a> &amp;PA;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/analysiskey">AnalysisKey</a> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ID;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsAbandoned;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// A PreservedAnalysisChecker is tied to a particular Analysis because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// &#96;preserved()&#96; and &#96;preservedSet()&#96; both return false if the Analysis</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// was abandoned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PreservedAnalysisChecker(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/preservedanalysischecker/#a95bf63b09676aa0018e54d1592c7d912">PreservedAnalyses</a> &amp;PA, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/analysiskey">AnalysisKey</a> &#42;ID)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">        : PA(PA), ID(ID), IsAbandoned(PA.NotPreservedAnalysisIDs.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>(ID)) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Returns true if the checker&#39;s analysis was not abandoned and either</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///  - the analysis is explicitly preserved or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///  - all analyses are preserved.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/preservedanalysischecker/#a2f84945a09787006fe8e0c94e1de89f1"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/preservedanalysischecker/#a2f84945a09787006fe8e0c94e1de89f1">preserved</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> !IsAbandoned &amp;&amp; (PA.PreservedIDs.count(&amp;AllAnalysesKey) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              PA.PreservedIDs.count(ID));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Return true if the checker&#39;s analysis was not abandoned, i.e. it was not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// explicitly invalidated. Even if the analysis is not explicitly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// preserved, if the analysis is known stateless, then it is preserved.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/preservedanalysischecker/#a48ecc8b3108b550239565f675adfd6f8"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/preservedanalysischecker/#a48ecc8b3108b550239565f675adfd6f8">preservedWhenStateless</a>() &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> !IsAbandoned; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// Returns true if the checker&#39;s analysis was not abandoned and either</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///  - \\p AnalysisSetT is explicitly preserved or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    ///  - all analyses are preserved.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/preservedanalysischecker/#abaaa2690a96aed712836f8f292d8128c"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AnalysisSetT&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/preservedanalysischecker/#abaaa2690a96aed712836f8f292d8128c">preservedSet</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/analysissetkey">AnalysisSetKey</a> &#42;SetID = AnalysisSetT::ID();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> !IsAbandoned &amp;&amp; (PA.PreservedIDs.count(&amp;AllAnalysesKey) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              PA.PreservedIDs.count(SetID));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
